data.title: San Francisco International Airport
data.meta_description: |Courtesy shuttles to participating airport-area hotels are located at the Hotel Courtesy Shuttle Zone on the center island of the Departures/Ticketing Level roadway at all terminals. Phones to contact the hotels are available in the shelters at each zone.
data.text:
Courtesy shuttles to participating airport-area hotels are located at the Hotel Courtesy Shuttle Zone on the center island of the Departures/Ticketing Level roadway at all terminals. Phones to contact the hotels are available in the shelters at each zone.

Please note: These shuttles service only participating airport-area hotels, and do not provide service to San Francisco or other regions of the Bay Area. Travelers should confirm shuttle service availability with their hotel booking.
